text: Bruce Kerry Chapman (born December 1, 1940)Bruce Kerry Chapman , HistoryMakers Biographical Database is an American researcher, politician and founder and current Chairman of the Board of the Discovery Institute. He is a conservative. From 1975 until 1981, he was the 12th Secretary of State of Washington. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States Category:Politicians from Evanston, Illinois Category:Businesspeople from Evanston, Illinois Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Writers from Evanston, Illinois
title: Bruce Chapman
